name: GravityJump
description:
The LameJam14 had the "gravity" theme, that's why I oriented my game around this.

Each level has a unique gravity mechanic and a hard mode for Epic Gamers.
It's a platformer made in 2 days and the credits for the assets and musics are found ingame on the main menu.

I really hope you'll like playing my (first) game!
